title: President George Washington's Birthday, 2025
summary: The document is a proclamation by President Donald J. Trump, dated February 17, 2025, declaring February 17 as a holiday to commemorate George Washington's Birthday. It honors Washington as the first President of the United States, recognizing his heroic legacy, dedication to the nation, and role as a founding architect of the Federal Government. The proclamation emphasizes Washington's virtues, including his commitment to public service, patriotism, and resilience during the Revolutionary War, particularly highlighting his leadership during the difficult winter of 1776. The document calls for Americans to reflect on Washington's sacrifices and victories as guiding principles in the ongoing work of national reform.
